response.overview: PDC Athra Cheriya Degree Alla traces the journey of a group of teenagers as they transition from the rigid environment of school to the freedom of a parallel college. Set against a comic backdrop, the film explores their youthful highs and lows, friendships, and formative experiences. Years later, the same group reconnects through a WhatsApp group called `GT` and begins meeting annually after 24 years. Through a non-linear narrative, the film blends nostalgia, contributions from old classmates, and current social issues, all converging around a significant personal dilemma faced by one of them. A blend of fiction and reality, this bio-fictional tale reflects on time, change, and enduring bonds.
response.title: PDC Athra Cheriya Degree Alla
